Module jBomberman
Package model

Class VisitorCharactersMover

java.lang.Object
model.VisitorCharactersMover
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyGridFormat, Visitor
public class VisitorCharactersMover extends Object implements Visitor, MyGridFormat
This Visitor encapsulates all the methods that determine Game Character movement. In doing so, it makes the game grid communicate with the game panel. Furthermore, it defines during its construction the limits of the panel in which the game grid is located and in which the game characters can move. These limits are the ones he considers to make the movements. The View will actually set these values ​​when the instance of this object is created in the Controller.

  • Constructor Details

    • VisitorCharactersMover

      public VisitorCharactersMover(int leftX, int rightX, int upperY, int lowerY, int tesseraeUnit, int offsetY, int offsetX)
      Visitor Characters Mover Constructor that also define Game Panel Border Limits.
      Parameters:
      leftX - minimum value for the x coordinate of a point belonging to the panel.
      rightX - Maximum value for the x coordinate of a point belonging to the panel.
      upperY - minimum value for the y coordinate of a point belonging to the panel.
      lowerY - Maximum value for the y coordinate of a point belonging to the panel.
      tesseraeUnit - Side of the square that identifies a cell of the game grid
      offsetY - Relative offset of the panel origin point for the y coordinate
      offsetX - Relative offset of the panel origin point for the x coordinate

    • keepOnlySolidSquares

      public Map<CartesianCoordinate,GameCharacter.Degree> keepOnlySolidSquares(Map<CartesianCoordinate,GameCharacter.Degree> map)
      Removes points that belong to areas over which movement is possible. Only the points that belong to solid areas will remain.
      Parameters:
      map - Map of the points to filter
      Returns:
      Filtered map
